name: fetchEvent(forTask:occurrence:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches a single occurrence of a specific task asynchronously from the store. Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func fetchEvent(forTask: Self.Task, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Event>)
items.desc: Available when Outcome is OCKOutcome, OutcomeQuery is OCKOutcomeQuery, and Task conforms to OCKAnyVersionableTask.

declaration: func fetchEvent(forTask task: Self.Task, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: @escaping OCKResultClosure<Self.Event>)
